comment.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UGuC6wunr-I](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DUGuC6wunr-I) ### Comment Username: `@4n7hony` > Some social icons are not removed from the share popup. These icons appear only while logged in. I believe that the filter: > "youtube.com#?#yt-share-target-renderer > button.yt-share-target-renderer > yt-icon g[fill-rule].style-scope:upward(button.yt-share-target-renderer)" > is not removing those icons because the attribute [fill-rule] is located in 'circle' instead of 'g' for LiveJournal and it doesn't exist at all for Yahoo! Japan. > Could this filter be swapped with: "youtube.com##yt-share-target-renderer:not(:first-of-type)"? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/w8a2Guj.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin Browser: | Opera Filters: | Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media
